response.overview: During a pivotal mission, Victor Sheppard is separated from his team. With time running out, he must locate and neutralize a notorious weapon engineer known only as "The Doctor". Adapted from the American Terror Graphic Novel, by Jeff McComsey. The six minute animated short is a supplementary story and collaboration between Joseph Krzemienski's award winning studio, theFictory, and Jeff McComsey.
response.tagline: Victor Sheppard is out to prove the only thing in this world more dangerous than an Army for sale, is a man who is not.
response.title: American Terror: Company Man
